The correct answer is A: [00:02:17 - 00:03:14]. 

In this segment, the woman in a white blazer can be heard discussing the insufficient funds allocated to the fund for European aid for the most deprived and advocating for an increase to 3.5 billion euros. The title "What is the European Parliament's view of the fund?" also appears on the screen during this segment.
The answer is unknown as the provided text does not contain any information regarding the appearance of the title "How does the fund address the problem of food waste?" during the speech.
